title: Comparing BIRCH and MiniBatchKMeans
description: This lab compares the timing of two clustering algorithms, BIRCH and MiniBatchKMeans, on a synthetic dataset. Both algorithms are scalable and can efficiently cluster large datasets. The synthetic dataset has 25,000 samples and two features generated using make_blobs.
